recipes.name: vegan pizza
recipes.description: A mouth-watering vegan pizza with a twist
recipes.method: For the pizza dough, you'll need warm water, fast-acting yeast, all-purpose flour, olive oil, sugar, salt, and garlic powder. Then top with all ingredients above.

recipes.name: buda bowl salad
recipes.description: The ultimate nutrient-packed vegan buddha bowl!.
recipes.method: Add all fresh veggies together with the beans. For the tahini sauce: add 1/3 cup of tahini with lemon juice and 1/4 teaspoon of turmeric, salt and pepper and a splash of water. Shake well and add to salad.

recipes.name: creamy green leek and pea pasta
recipes.description: This creamy and delicious green pasta doesn't take much effort to whip together
recipes.method: Boil pasta to package instructions. Meanwhile cut 2 leaks in julienne and add to a frying pan with the minced garlic.

recipes.name: black bean vegan burger
recipes.method: Heat the oil in a large pan and fry the leek, mushrooms, thyme, tofu and kale for about 5 mins.

recipes.name: my favourite vegan pizza
recipes.description: Ahh, pizza night. A thing to be cherished.
recipes.method: The BEST vegan pizza made with a garlic-herb crust, simple tomato sauce, TONS of sauteed veggies, and vegan parmesan cheese. Thin crust, tons of flavor, and ridiculously satisfying.

recipes.name: easy pizzie...
recipes.description: EASY VEGGIE VEGAN PIZZA WITH 20 MINUTE CRUST.
recipes.method: Pizza Sauce, Veggies, Mushrooms, Kalamata Olives, Garlic + olive oil for amazing flavor, baked to perfection. Dressed with Vegan Parmesan and fresh basil.

recipes.name: vegan pizza
recipes.method: the ingredients for a pizza dough in general, is so simple.However, since we’re making a vegan pizza, we’ll keep the rest of the ingredients vegan and dairy free as well!

recipes.name: vegan burger
recipes.description: The best vegan burger loaded with flavor and suitable for the grill or stovetop. Hearty and satisfying with a delicious texture.
recipes.method: the texture is meaty, but don’t worry you would never mistake them for actual meat. But they are nice and fat, super hearty and filling, with a mix of spices that creates that wonderful BBQ flavor.

recipes.name: vegan burger
recipes.description: Jamie Oliver's ultimate take on veggie burgers
recipes.method: Drain the chickpeas and sweetcorn, then tip into a food processor. Pick the coriander leaves, adding half the leaves and all the stalks to the processor.

recipes.name: vegan burger
recipes.description: Mouth-watering Quick Vegan Pulled Jackfruit Burger with Barbecue Sauce
recipes.method: Tip the drained jackfruit onto a chopping board. Cut away the central woody core then pull the fruit into thin shreds with two forks.

recipes.name: vegan salad
recipes.method: Cut your broccoli small. Because the broccoli stays raw for this dish, you want to make sure the pieces are small enough to become fully coated and soften in the dressing.

recipes.name: beetroot salad
recipes.description: Serve this tasty beetroot, chickpea and lentil tabbouleh as a side dish or vegan main. It's healthy, gluten-free, low-calorie and three of your five-a-day.
recipes.method: Put the herbs, radishes and beetroot in a food processor and blitz until chopped into small pieces.
